### Research Facility
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Issues
- When placing entities, verify there is enough clear space and no collisions with existing structures
- Consider spacing requirements when placing inserters between entities
- Check if target position is suitable for entity placement before attempting to place
- Ensure proper alignment and spacing between connected entities

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Cannot craft items when recipes are not enabled (stone furnace, iron gear wheel)
- Verify recipe availability and enabled status before attempting to craft
- Handle nil recipe cases appropriately
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before crafting

### Mining System Issues
- Verify coal patch location before setting up mining infrastructure
- Position mining drills properly on resource patches
- Consider drill orientation and output position when setting up automated mining
- Ensure proper spacing for inserter placement between drill and chest

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks

### Fuel Management Issues
- Cannot insert items into entities without being next to them
- Monitor fuel levels in all fuel-consuming entities
- Ensure proper fuel type is being used for burner devices
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems where possible

### Entity State Verification Issues
- Check entity existence before attempting operations
- Verify entity state and warnings before operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed
- Monitor entity status changes after operations
